"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54daac876368726db6cf0300#post_54daac876368726db6cf0300
[bq="ParagonCommander"]"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54daac1863687229be8c2d00#post_54daac1863687229be8c2d00
Fuck it, I might give it a go as well for shits and giggles. It seems silly enough.
Is it just slice of life or is there a plot line?[/bq]
There's _kinda_ a plot line but it mostly just focuses on the everyday lives of the characters. It's slice of life through and through, even if it doesn't appear to be at first glance.

Umm... *googles Yotsuba*

That kinda tells you the answer, but no I've never even heard of it until now, sounds interesting though

*adds to massive backlog of anime/manga things*
